thread.title: Steve
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: I have never purchased a vape online before, let alone any product in this category, that being said this has been a great experience. The free shipping was quicker than expected ( I ordered Thursday night, the package arrived Monday). The shipping envelope was also labeled with discretion. Customer service is outstanding as I had a few questions about my order and they were answered promptly and sufficiently. The free Grinder is far above average in terms of quality and is of a very good size. The free airtight container is also a great bonus. The vape I purchased was the Focusvape Pro, which I highly recommend to anyone looking for a great vape at a great price. I am a very satisfied customer and plan to use POTV again, and will recommend them to anyone looking for a great online vape store.
